State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: Animation in first and third POV for ingestibles.
State.Name: Animated Ingestibles

State.Author: djmystro - Qolore7
State.Description: Complete stripping down/balancing of A World of Pain. Removes all unvoiced NPCs, quests, and un-lore friendly interiors, as well as heavily balancing the remaining locations.
State.Name: A World of (Less) Pain - A Lore Friendly AWOP Revision

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A collection of small vanilla-friendly gameplay improvements that have been fully merged, updated, and cleaned.
State.Name: Essential Vanilla Enhancements Merged

State.Author: hman101
State.Description: Selling power armor or high tech energy weapons to random wastelanders will damage your reputation with the Brotherhood of Steel. Fully configurable and compatible with TTW. This mod also allows you to turn in technology to the Brotherhood in the same way you could with the Outcast in Fallout 3.
State.Name: Jealous Brotherhood

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: A place to store incomplete, weird, creepy, bugged, cursed and super tiny mods from me.
State.Name: The Bazaar of Z

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Remove the terminal (used to buy suite upgrades) on the wall and use the terminal in the bedroom instead (see images).
State.Name: Lucky 38 Suite Upgrade Terminal Tweak

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Overhaul of New Vegas's raider factions, balancing their loot and adding more of them to fight.
State.Name: Mojave Raiders

State.Author: friendlynonmurderingsort
State.Description: Adds a realistic amount of garbage to the shores and shallows along Lake Mead.
State.Name: Realistically Trashed Water

State.Author: Slick
State.Description: Adds some much needed population to Freeside. Based on Freeside Open, with some additions and fixes. Vanilla version available.
State.Name: Simple Populated Freeside

State.Author: pintocat - Roy Batty
State.Description: This removes message boxes that pop up during the tutorial, as well as one-time help pop-ups,  repeating corner-messages.
State.Name: Tutorial Killer

State.Author: vurt and Marcurios
State.Description: 100+ new desert types of trees and plants. 3D LODS! Better looking grass. New terrain textures (optional).
State.Name: Wasteland Flora and Terrain Overhaul

State.Author: Kezyma
State.Description: Root Builder is a Mod Organizer 2 plugin that allows you to manage files in the base game folder through Mod Organizer, leaving your game folder in pristine, vanilla condition!
State.Name: Kezyma's Root Builder for Mod Organizer

State.Author: zilav
State.Description: Decompresses the Fallout New Vegas BSAs and repacks them without zlib compression for performance, Also transcodes the .ogg sounds effects to .wav so they work. It also extracts any mp3 files to loose files because they will not play when in a BSA.
State.Name: FNV BSA Decompressor

State.Author: Slippy
State.Description: Returns the junk items you would logically get from ingesting things like cans of food and lunchbox meals.
State.Name: Food Scraps

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: Adds crafting stations and additional containers to several vanilla player homes.
State.Name: Home and Safehouse Tweaks

State.Author: Deus Gladiorum
State.Description:
[font=Tahoma][color=#ffd966][size=5][b]Now Version 1.2.1![/b]

[/size][/color][/font]



Real Recoil is NOT just another copy of Vertical recoilmod. This is the first and only visually smooth, truly dynamic, and realistic recoil system to ever be added to Fallout: New Vegas, and it aims to bring New Vegas's gunplay into the m
State.Name: Real Recoil

State.Author: Slippy
State.Description: A rebalance mod intended to keep the game interesting and challenging for experienced players.
State.Name: Vicious Wastes - Difficulty Rebalance

State.Author: ElminsterAU and the xEdit Team
State.Description: FNVEdit is the Fallout New Vegas version of xEdit. xEdit is an advanced graphical module viewer/editor and conflict detector.
State.Name: FNVEdit

Original.Name: NV Wall Terminals Animated Screen Savers-66536-1-00-update-1578543068.rar

State.Author: AmaccurzerO
State.Description: This mod adds custom animated screen savers to all desk terminals in the game.
State.Name: NV  Animated Terminal Screen Saver

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds balanced vanilla-style backpacks and an expandable scripted framework that allows backpacks to take damage from combat.
State.Name: Better Balanced Backpacks

Original.Name: Camp McCarran monorail animation stand alone version-70213-2-00-1609887871.rar

State.Author: AmaccurzerO
State.Description: This mods animates the Camp McCarran's monorail. This monorail will travel frequently between Camp McCarran and The Strip. Read description and watch video.
State.Name: Camp McCarran Animated Monorail

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: Cleans up HUD textures (such as the compass ticks or other arrows) that have went unnoticed. The cleaning consists of removing the old noise, and sometimes i replace the old noise with a new one.
State.Name: Vanilla Hud Cleaned

Original.Name: Contextual HUD - Clean Vanilla HUD Patch-77631-1-3a-1659202460.7z

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: HUD elements will only show under certain conditions, configurable via an INI. A modern spiritual successor to Immersive HUD
State.Name: Contextual HUD

State.Author: Kormakur
State.Description: xNVSE plugin that enhances the in-game console's abilities to be able to execute and print results from ALL available script commands. Full scripting support inside console, including creating variables and evaluating NVSE expressions (arrays, strings) for easy mod development and prototyping. Mouse wheel scrolling included too.
State.Name: Improved Console (NVSE)

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: Merge of my best (IMO) 'Lively' mods.
State.Name: Lively Merge

State.Author: tomzik
State.Description: A collection of new, low poly models to use during generating LOD.
State.Name: LOD additions and improvements

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
Engine bugfixes, optional tweaks and new features with no performance impact. Fully customisable via in-game menu and INIs. 

Includes Inventory Searching, Cookable Grenades, Manual Reload, Smooth Aiming, WASD Menu Support and more. 

Fully compatible with TTW and The Frontier.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks and Engine Fixes

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Fixes moonlight, making the moon the light caster instead of the sun.
State.Name: MoonlightNVSE

State.Author: pilamin
State.Description: Adds new distant level-of-detail to many world objects; from vehicles, roads, barricades, and lots of rocks.
State.Name: Much Needed LOD

State.Author: RoyBatty and SciRika
State.Description: Optimizations and fixes for a large selection of meshes in the base game and DLC.
State.Name: New Vegas Mesh Improvement Mod - NVMIM

State.Author: Carxt - Tgspy - lStewieAl
State.Description: The newest generation in performance enhancement and stutter fixing. Windows 10 compatible. Featuring fixes to the dreaded micro stutter, and a high FPS Havok fix.
State.Name: NVTF - New Vegas Tick Fix

State.Author: Diegonom
State.Description: Ever just looked at Red Rock Canyon and think: "Damn bitch, you ugly"?? then this mod is for you. Doing a few little things that make a huge difference.
State.Name: Red On The Rocks

State.Author: TommInfinite and everyone he copied code from
State.Description: NVSE plugin which adds new functions and allows modders to easily add new UI elements to the game (HUD Bars).
State.Name: SUP NVSE

Original.Name: YUP - Base Game and All DLC-51664-12-6-1672072862.7z

State.Author: Yukichigai - Currently maintained by sandbox
State.Description: A compilation of vital bug fixes for Fallout: New Vegas and its DLC, all combined into one ESM.  The only pure bug fix compilation available on the Nexus: no new features, no balance tweaks, no restored content.  Just bug fixes and nothing but bug fixes.  Available in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, and Russian.
State.Name: Yukichigai Unofficial Patch - YUP

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Threw everything I had into one pack to celebrate 10 years of... this.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack

State.Author: Hitman47101 and Uploader
State.Description: Fixed camera jumps, animation snapping, movement lock, broken aim in 3rd person.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack - General Bugfix

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description: Blends Hit - Locomotion, rockomotion, and some of hitman's old locomotion (jump files) into one locomotion set.
State.Name: Blended Locomotion

Original.Name: 2. Butcher Pete Complete - A Melee Animation Overhaul (No Locomotion)-79146-1-0-1669917143.rar

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
A comprehensive melee animation overhaul for almost every single one-handed melee weapon in New Vegas, its DLCs, and TTW.



Chop, slice, and bludgeon that Pete.
State.Name: Butcher Pete Complete - A Melee Animation Overhaul

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a interface overhaul that cleans up all of the smudgy Icons and the textures surrounding the Companion Wheel while retaining the original design as much as possible.
State.Name: Clean Companion Wheel

State.Author: Hitman47101 - Hopper31
State.Description: Victor is a cowboy robot, now he has the hat(s) to match.
State.Name: Hit - Cowboy Victor

State.Author: Scott Clam
State.Description: An overhaul of the weathers in New Vegas with 360 panoramic cloud textures, DLC support, and optional presets for Reshade and ENB.
State.Name: Desert Natural Weathers

State.Author: Ehamloptiran Sheson and FNVEdit Team
State.Description: An almost one click LOD generator for Fallout: New Vegas
State.Name: FNVLODGen

State.Author: yvileapsis
State.Description:
Just a mod that adds dynamic crosshair which reacts to changes in weapon's spread. 

Requires UIO and JIPLN.
State.Name: JDC - Just Dynamic Crosshair

Original.Name: Laser Weapon Iron Sights - Gun Runner's Arsenal Merged-70790-1-7-1642221292.zip

State.Author: Ghost8919
State.Description: When Bethesda made Fallout 3, they didn't include weapon ADSing. When Obsidian made Fallout: New Vegas, they added it in, though didn't add it to every weapon. Among those are the AER and AEP series of Laser Arms. This mod looks to change that. After all, Laser Weapons need Iron Sights too!
State.Name: Laser Weapon Iron Sights

Original.Name: Plasma Weapon Iron Sights - Gun Runner's Arsenal Merged-70790-1-1-1642221863.zip

State.Author: Ghost8919
State.Description: When Bethesda made Fallout 3, they didn't include weapon ADSing. When Obsidian made Fallout: New Vegas, they added it in, though didn't add it to every weapon. Among those are the AER and AEP series of Laser Arms. This mod looks to change that. After all, Laser Weapons need Iron Sights too!
State.Name: Laser Weapon Iron Sights

State.Author: Scott Clam
State.Description: Replaces some large trees and other plants in Vurt's Wasteland Flora Overhaul with empty, invisible meshes, leaving a more desert style but still fairly lush landscape. No .esp. Requires original mod.
State.Name: Less Fertile Wasteland Flora Overhaul

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: A modification of the Lucky 38 lights before and after they have been turned on during the Mr. House/Yes Man questlines (see pictures and description).
State.Name: Lucky 38 Lights Redone

State.Author: caleb gamman
State.Description: Fixes visual bugs with ENB AO and hair
State.Name: ENB Hair Fixes (Minimal)

State.Author: AmaccurzerO - Nehred
State.Description: This mod adds a lip sync animation to the securitrons. Read description to see the list of the securitrons affected. Watch video.
State.Name: NV Securitrons Lip Sync

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Securitrons' faces will change when they enter combat mode.
State.Name: Securitrons On Alert

State.Author: KaneWright
State.Description: This mod makes door window and small window under door semitransparent.
State.Name: Semitransparent Door Glass(plugin version)

State.Author: PlatinumShad0w
State.Description: Small tweaks to improve the Mojave Brotherhood of Steel as a faction like more ways to gain fame, fixing their ending to account for certain overlooked endgame conditions, the ability to have the Knights repair your equipment, a small quest to return holotags, diversified leveled lists and a new weapon.
State.Name: Better Brotherhood

State.Author: Slippy
State.Description: Adds a S.T.A.L.K.E.R. inspired bleeding and bandaging system to Fallout: New Vegas.
State.Name: Bleedout - A Bleeding Mod

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: Chloe
State.Description: Attempt to fix Elijah's voice loudness and clipping issues in Dead Money.
State.Name: Elijah Voice Audio Files Fix

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Drastically improves performance on The Strip by getting rid of... water LOD
State.Name: Aqua Performa - Strip Performance Fix

Original.Name: 2. Wasteland Warrior - A Melee Animation Overhaul (No Locomotion)-80277-1-0-1678034975.rar

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
Reanimates all animations for all two-handed melee weapon in the game. Yes, all of them. Zero balance changes: vanilla timings and power attack rules are applied.



Requires kNVSE.
State.Name: Wasteland Warrior - A Melee Animation Overhaul

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

Original.Name: KARPSOL - Kabyi Armor Replacement Plugin Spice Of Life-75618-1-1-0-1657267945.7z

State.Author: kabyidon
State.Description: An .esp plugin replacer that rebalances, redistributes, and renames Nivea's Spice of Life armors for a more vanilla feel. Removes a lot of armors that expose neck seams or don't feel vanilla. Uses a script-based approach to avoid conflicts with other mods.
State.Name: KARPSOL - Kabyidon Armor Replacement Plugin for Spice of Life

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: Animation in first and third POV for ingestibles.
State.Name: Animated Ingestibles

State.Author: Scott Clam
State.Description: An overhaul of the weathers in New Vegas with 360 panoramic cloud textures, DLC support, and optional presets for Reshade and ENB.
State.Name: Desert Natural Weathers

Original.Name: Hoover Dam Jets Restored and Distant-72135-1-0-1619225107.7z

State.Author: zedas
State.Description: Restores the cut outflow jets to Hoover Dam and makes them visible up & down the Colorado.
State.Name: Hoover Dam Jets Restored and Distant

State.Author: asorly
State.Description: Corrects several minor issues with the Strip's street lights.
State.Name: Strip Street Light Corrections

State.Author: RoyBatty - team blackout
State.Description: Optimizes and cleans the esms, as well as fixes some hard errors in the landscape. Boosts performance on modern systems with SSDs
State.Name: Ultimate Edition ESM Fixes

State.Author: Roy Batty - LuthienAnarion
State.Description: Simple patcher to make Fallout New Vegas 4GB Aware. Supports all known Steam and GoG versions. The Bethesda.net and XBOX Game pass versions are NOT supported since NVSE will not support them either.
State.Name: FNV 4GB Patcher

State.Author: VishVadeva50 - Wall_SoGB - Qolore7
State.Description: Files needed while following the "Viva New Vegas" guide.
State.Name: Viva New Vegas Resources

State.Author: AmaccurzerO
State.Description: This mod adds custom animated screen savers to all desk terminals in the game.
State.Name: NV  Animated Terminal Screen Saver

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Improves framerate in combat by fixing an engine bug that lowered framerate while attacking an enemy with a health-bar visible.
State.Name: Combat Lag Fix (NVSE)

State.Author: DavidJCobb and llde
State.Description: A DLL that logs raw crash data -- the instruction pointer, x86 register values, and an attempt at identifying the source DLL (and instruction pointer relative to its module base).
State.Name: Crash Logger

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Mod fixes incorrect exterior emittance handling which leads to particles being black.
State.Name: Exterior Emittance Fix - NVSE

State.Author: friendlynonmurderingsort
State.Description: Adds a Witcher 3 inspired hanged man's tree to the Nipton massacre.
State.Name: Hanged Man's Tree to Nipton

State.Author: AmaccurzerO
State.Description: This mods animates the Camp McCarran's monorail. This monorail will travel frequently between Camp McCarran and The Strip. Read description and watch video.
State.Name: Camp McCarran Animated Monorail

State.Author: Xilandro - master JazzIsParis - DarianStephens
State.Description: This mod adds weapon inertia. Part of Project B42. Thanks to JazzIsMagic... I mean Paris. ;)
State.Name: B42 Weapon Inertia

State.Author: th3overseer
State.Description: Adds a couple more gates in Freeside to make it less annoying to traverse.
State.Name: Extra Freeside Gates

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Assorted changes to remove annoying features from some followers. Enhanced Sensors, Spotter and Search and Mark perk effects changed. ED-Es no longer 'whir' whilst moving.
State.Name: Follower Tweaks

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: Brings some life to the Phebus couple.
State.Name: Lively Phebus

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Logical fixes/improvements to ownership for certain cells/items, as well as adding dynamic ownership to many cells
State.Name: Mass Ownership Tweaks

Original.Name: Mojave Wildlife - Vanilla No Chanced Spawns Version-64638-1-1-0-1666973220.7z

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds hundreds more leveled, vanilla-friendly creature spawn points throughout the whole Mojave, based off unused vanilla leveled lists. All spawn points are meticulously hand-placed and distributed as evenly and fairly as possible. Includes an optional Fallout 3-style version, including robot and super mutant spawns.
State.Name: Mojave Wildlife

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: A place to store incomplete, weird, creepy, bugged, cursed and super tiny mods from me.
State.Name: The Bazaar of Z

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: A place to store incomplete, weird, creepy, bugged, cursed and super tiny mods from me.
State.Name: The Bazaar of Z

State.Author: VishVadeva50 - Wall_SoGB - Qolore7
State.Description: Files needed while following the "Viva New Vegas" guide.
State.Name: Viva New Vegas Resources

State.Author: xNVSE Team
State.Description: The New Vegas Script Extender, or NVSE for short, is a modder's resource that expands the scripting capabilities of Fallout: NV. It does so without modifying the executable files on disk, so there are no permanent side effects.
State.Name: New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE xNVSE)

State.Author: Scott Clam
State.Description: An overhaul of the weathers in New Vegas with 360 panoramic cloud textures, DLC support, and optional presets for Reshade and ENB.
State.Name: Desert Natural Weathers

State.Author: Cyberlazy
State.Description: Vastly improves the LOD noise texture used on all distant land. Uses only minimal video memory and greatly improves quality.
State.Name: Improved LOD Noise Texture

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: A Tweaks .ini with just the essential bugfix and quality-of-life settings enabled, hand-picked by the GOAT himself
State.Name: Stewie Tweaks Essentials INI

State.Author: c6
State.Description: Improves game performance in combat by disabling lights produced by muzzle flashes.
State.Name: No Muzzle Flash Lights

State.Author: asorly
State.Description: Companions no longer fully-recover their injuries after combat ends.
State.Name: No Combat Recovery

State.Author: CarlZee
State.Description: Adds red Vault 19 jumpsuits to the red district of Vault 19.
State.Name: Vault 19 Red Suits

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Adds balanced vanilla-style backpacks and an expandable scripted framework that allows backpacks to take damage from combat.
State.Name: Better Balanced Backpacks

State.Author: yvileapsis
State.Description: Just a small mod that adds a FO76-like Loot Menu. Also features container animations by Hitman47101.
State.Name: JLM - Just Loot Menu

Original.Name: Less Flickery City of New Vegas-72061-0-01-1618409500.zip

State.Author: FaramH
State.Description: If you play NV at higher than normal settings, you'll notice intense flickering in the city of New Vegas (e.g. when looking from Goodsprings cemetery) due to extra white proxy meshes clipping into the object LOD meshes. This simple mod fixes that (does not fix the engine Z-fighting) by removing the offending white imposter meshes.
State.Name: Less Flickery City of New Vegas

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Prevents the game becoming too easy by making enemies more likely to target the player in combat rather than companions.
State.Name: Player Combat Priority

Original.Name: Spice of Life Vanilla v1-5 Release Candidate.7z

State.Author: tom2g0
State.Description: Tweaks to the Strip Walls Restored mod
State.Name: Strip Walls Restored Tweaks

Original.Name: Vanilla UI Plus - Max Carry Weight Patch-74798-VUIMaxCWPatch-1-1678550864.zip

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: A place to store incomplete, weird, creepy, bugged, cursed and super tiny mods from me.
State.Name: The Bazaar of Z

State.Author: Gisli
State.Description: Ever noticed how some buildings in the game have no windows even though on the outside they're covered in windows? Like what kind of presidential suite doesn't have windows? Well, this mod tries to fix that by adding windows into those interiors.
State.Name: Windows of the Mojave

State.Author: The UPNVSE Pals
State.Description: An updated and refined selection of bugfixes (mostly) requiring NVSE.
State.Name: Unofficial Patch NVSE Plus

State.Author: Scott Clam
State.Description: An overhaul of the weathers in New Vegas with 360 panoramic cloud textures, DLC support, and optional presets for Reshade and ENB.
State.Name: Desert Natural Weathers

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: Various
State.Description: A skeleton with compatibility for the latest mods
State.Name: NV Compatibility Skeleton

State.Author: Scott Clam
State.Description: Replaces some large trees and other plants in Vurt's Wasteland Flora Overhaul with empty, invisible meshes, leaving a more desert style but still fairly lush landscape. No .esp. Requires original mod.
State.Name: Less Fertile Wasteland Flora Overhaul

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Adds campfires and hotplates to logical locations to add some extra life to areas and give convenient crafting locations
State.Name: Campfires and Hotplates

State.Author: Scott Clam
State.Description: An overhaul of the weathers in New Vegas with 360 panoramic cloud textures, DLC support, and optional presets for Reshade and ENB.
State.Name: Desert Natural Weathers

State.Author: Original mod by ariusvalvius
State.Description: Adds Great Khans, Securitrons, NCR and Legion patrols and Brotherhood of Steel paladins on lore-friendly locations.
State.Name: Faction Wasteland Presence - Improved Edition

Original.Name: Strip Lights Region Fix - Hoover Dam Jets Restored and Distant-73596-Patch-1644119080.7z

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Fixes a vanilla issue about the Strip lights not showing in certain parts of the map.
State.Name: Strip Lights Region Fix

State.Author: S6S and Clavyn and Mr Shersh
State.Description:
This mod adds hitstop for melee weapons, by slowing down gametime to .1 for a few frames, then restoring it. Sounds still play normally, and the frame delay before returning to full speed is configurable.

You can also have a small image modifier applied with some blur to make the effect more prominent.
State.Name: Melee Hitstop Effects

State.Author: Original mod by phoenix0113
State.Description: Scatters GRA unique weapons across the Mojave but also makes improvements and balance changes to the original mod.
State.Name: Rewarding Exploring - Improved Edition

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: An NVSE-powered plugin that is designed to manage and maintain all UI/HUD extensions added to the game by various mods. Once installed, UIO will ensure UI extensions are always properly installed and, when necessary, properly removed; it will automatically detect, resolve and prevent UI-related issues, and will help keep the game's UI intact.
State.Name: UIO - User Interface Organizer

State.Author: jazzisparis and LuthienAnarion
State.Description:
This plugin is an extension of the New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE). It adds 1000+ new functions, which can be used in GECK scripting and (in some cases) as conditions.

Additionally, this mod includes numerous engine bug fixes/tweaks, and restores several broken game features.
State.Name: JIP LN NVSE Plugin

State.Author: Nucleoprotein AKA virusek - Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Truly updated OneTweak.
State.Name: OneTweak but Really Updated

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: JSawyer's popular mod, fully re-implemented from the ground up. Compatibility has been greatly improved, errors have been fixed, and balance corrections have been expanded - all whilst trying to maintain the original mod's vision.
State.Name: JSawyer Ultimate Edition

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: The citizens of Mojave have now realized that leaving their doors unlocked in a post-apocalyptic wasteland perhaps isn't a great idea. Requires NVSE, JIP, Johnny, and ShowOff NVSE.
State.Name: Lock Those Doors

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: Simple, scripted mod makes it so that NPCs will either fight or flee you if you point a gun at them. Outcome is influenced by player strength and luck.
State.Name: Point that somewhere else - NPCs react to you pointing a gun at them

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
Reanimates all animations for all two-handed melee weapon in the game. Yes, all of them. Zero balance changes: vanilla timings and power attack rules are applied.



Requires kNVSE.
State.Name: Wasteland Warrior - A Melee Animation Overhaul

State.Author: Krazzyklown
State.Description: Overhaul of xax34hah's RAD mod. Rewrote the entire UI portion, major changes to the script including rebalancing and bugfixes.
State.Name: RAD - Radiation (is) Actually Dangerous - Overhaul

State.Author: BlooperReel
State.Description: A modern alternative to Populated Casinos. Realistic casino populations with an emphasis on minimal amounts of new NPCs, plus better performance and stability.
State.Name: Casino Crowds

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: HUD elements will only show under certain conditions, configurable via an INI. A modern spiritual successor to Immersive HUD
State.Name: Contextual HUD

State.Author: asorly
State.Description: Fast Traveling costs Caps to simulate money spent on travel expenses such as food and water.
State.Name: Fast Travel Costs

Original.Name: I Fought the Law - Simple NCR Start-75924-1-0a-1648577850.7z

State.Author: PlatinumShad0w
State.Description: Adds a simple way to help the NCR retake the NCRCF Prison in the quest "I Fought the Law" without having to work for the Powder Gangers first.
State.Name: I Fought the Law - Simple NCR Start

State.Author: yvileapsis
State.Description: Just a small mod that adds a FO76-like Loot Menu. Also features container animations by Hitman47101.
State.Name: JLM - Just Loot Menu

State.Author: Kazopert
State.Description: A lightweight overhaul of the Strip that turns to walls from junk to brick, cleans the litter up off of the street, and buffs out the cracked marble and peeling wallpaper as well as much more, making the Strip far more pleasing to the eye.
State.Name: LSO - A Lightweight Strip Overhaul

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Expands the vanilla trespassing mechanic to extend to logical areas, i.e. vendors won't allow you behind their counters
State.Name: Off Limits

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Fixes a vanilla issue about the Strip lights not showing in certain parts of the map.
State.Name: Strip Lights Region Fix

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Fixes all the iron sights on vanilla weapon meshes using ISControl Enabler. No meshes and no ESP
State.Name: Vanilla Iron Sights Realligned

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Fixes a save bloating issue related to actors detecting the player, improving save/load speed and decreasing save size 10-30% depending on playthrough length.
State.Name: ActorCause Save Bloat Fix

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Allows for customizable bloom resolution, making it possible to use resolutions other than vanilla's quarter one.
State.Name: High Resolution Bloom NVSE

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Fixes Pip-Boy's shading, making it not ignore lights around it
State.Name: Pip-Boy Shading Fix NVSE

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: A total overhaul to Mojave Express Dropboxes. Replaces vanilla & situational Dropboxes with an expanding upgradable universal storage system. The Courier will reflect on their surroundings during each initial visit, further grounding the system into the culture of the Mojave and adding a sense of progression to an otherwise forgotten feature.
State.Name: The Freepost Mojave Express Expansion

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description:
Adds an MCM menu with options for adjust World Field of View, Player Field of View, Pipboy Field of View and Terminal Screen Field of View.

Also allows adjusting the Scope Scissor Amount, Weapon FOV Ratio, FOV Zoom time, Dialogue Zoom time and Dialogue delay time.
State.Name: FOV Slider

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Makes sneak attack critical damage scale with the player's sneak skill, configurable via an INI file
State.Name: Progressive Sneak Attack Damage

Original.Name: Strip Lights Region Fix - Uncut Wasteland-73596-Patch-1644119144.7z

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Fixes a vanilla issue about the Strip lights not showing in certain parts of the map.
State.Name: Strip Lights Region Fix

State.Author: Qolore7 - Macintroll
State.Description: Breathes new life and atmosphere into Vault 22, a complete remaster of Macintroll's Vault 22 Flora Overhaul
State.Name: Vault 22 Flora Overhaul Remastered

State.Author: doitsujin - Joshua Ashton - Sporif - Ph42oN
State.Description: Latest release of DXVK.
State.Name: DXVK

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This library will replace the in-game heap with a faster, more optimized version. It should decrease load times, remove some stutter and slightly improve frame rate.
State.Name: New Vegas Heap Replacer

State.Author: carxt
State.Description: Patch for the insanely annoying bug where the player character's spine snaps out of place when aiming in third person.
State.Name: Aim Transition Patch (NVSE)

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Engine plugin significantly improving the usability of the Caravan minigame. Optionally fixes AI bugs to make them a little smarter.
State.Name: Better Caravan

State.Author: carxt - lStewieAl - c6
State.Description: PLAY THE GUITAR, PLAY IT AGAIN, MY JOHNNYYYYYYYYYYYY.
State.Name: JohnnyGuitar NVSE

State.Author: Hitman47101 and Uploader
State.Description: Fixed camera jumps, animation snapping, movement lock, broken aim in 3rd person.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack - General Bugfix

State.Author: ceski
State.Description: Modifies the Pip-Boy animation to be 2x or 3x faster than default. Works with most Pip-Boy mods.
State.Name: Faster Pip-Boy Animation

State.Author: AmaccurzerO
State.Description: This mod animates the nuka cola and sarsaparrilla vending machines to work as vending machines and not as simple containers.. Read description and watch videos.
State.Name: NV Animated Vending Machines

Original.Name: Chems and Drugs are actually banned by the Legion - Redux-74221-1-10-1635615469.zip

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: Simple, scripted event-handler mod that makes consuming banned items in the presence of Legionnaires incur a reputation penalty.
State.Name: Consuming banned items in the presence of Legionnaires incurs a reputation penalty

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: A user configurable overhaul of the fast travel system that implements D&D styled random encounters when the player fast travels.
State.Name: Immersive Fast Travel Encounters

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: Brings some life to the Tops' 13th floor.
State.Name: Lively 13th Floor

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Various random mods I've made while playing that aren't big enough to earn their own page. Stuff will continue to be released as I find stuff to change. All in one version available!
State.Name: Miscellaneous Tweaks Collection

State.Author: Inthegrave
State.Description: This mod fixes and improves vanilla game pathfinding errors and will provide a better and more challenging experience with the AI. This will be an ongoing project and will be supported with updates through the years. So look forward to many more updates to come.
State.Name: Improved AI (Navmesh Overhaul Mod)

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Restores some cut but fully-functional NPCs to the Strip.
State.Name: The Strip NPCs Uncut - Content Restoration

Original.Name: Lightweight Strip Overhaul - Uncut Wasteland Patch-65665-1-5-1572355229.7z

State.Author: Kazopert
State.Description: A lightweight overhaul of the Strip that turns to walls from junk to brick, cleans the litter up off of the street, and buffs out the cracked marble and peeling wallpaper as well as much more, making the Strip far more pleasing to the eye.
State.Name: LSO - A Lightweight Strip Overhaul

State.Author: AmaccurzerO
State.Description: This simple mod adds transparency and a flickering flame to the lanterns in the game to make them more immersive and realistic.
State.Name: NV Animated Immersive Lanterns

State.Author: cOJzZ
State.Description: A NVSE plugin intended to enable simple PC diagonal movements, inspired by the famous NV mod "Diagonal movement".
State.Name: DiaMoveNVSE Patched

State.Author: VishVadeva50 - WallSoGB
State.Description: Increases the resolution of local maps from 128 to 512 and optionally 1024.
State.Name: High Res Local Maps

State.Author: JediEater
State.Description: Adds hundreds of hand-placed Crows into the Wasteland. On top of buildings, lampposts, signs, trees, and more. Not just on the ground like Obsidian planned.
State.Name: A Murder of Crows

Original.Name: Gore Dismember and Explode Edits LE-77452-1-1-1681286288.7z

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist
State.Description: Fixes the odd behavior of limbs exploding/decapitating, when they shouldn't﻿…or should. For example, in the vanilla game if you hit someone with a blunt weapon, like a Dress Cane, the body part explodes. This also makes automatic guns not decapitate limbs. Spears also do not make limbs explode—like in the vanilla game.
State.Name: Gore Dismember and Explode Edits LE

Original.Name: Hidden Valley Overhauled Classic BoS Theme-70859-1-3-1-1674162374.zip

State.Author: Ludo
State.Description: Hidden Valley: Overhauled is a comprehensive, lore-friendly rework of the lighting and atmosphere of the Brotherhood of Steel's Hidden Valley Bunker that aims to better realise the potential of the location while staying true to Obsidian's vision.
State.Name: Hidden Valley Overhauled

State.Author: Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Dynamically adjusts draw distance in accordance with the fog to improve performance with little to no visual difference.
State.Name: Fog-based Object Culling

State.Author: yvileapsis
State.Description: NVSE plugin that alters the way Global Time Multiplier is modified so to provide better compatibility between mods and base game.
State.Name: yGTM (NVSE)

Original.Name: Less Horrendous Vikki and Vance Casino LOD-63956-0-2-1601553328.zip

State.Author: Faram aka Biohazard
State.Description: Replaces the terrible LOD model and textures of the boarded casino nif with a slightly better one based of the original mesh.
State.Name: Less Horrendous Vikki and Vance Casino LOD Mesh

State.Author: Original mod by AmaccurzerO - scripting changes by Abollinger07
State.Description: Some light changes I made to NV Animated Vending Machines at 3 AM, uploaded with permission from the original author.
State.Name: AmmacurzerO's NV Animated Vending Machines Revised

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Improves the character creation by speeding up the process, adding specialized gear based on your tag skills, and making Wild Wasteland an opt-in feature rather than a trait.
State.Name: Better Character Creation

State.Author: LogicDragon
State.Description: This is a NVSE plugin that enables a visible body and player shadows when in first person. Also, any points where the game force switches to 3rd person (sitting/knockout/death, etc.) are now in 1st person.
State.Name: New Vegas - Enhanced Camera

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: A user configurable overhaul of the sleep system that implements D&D styled random encounters when the player naps.
State.Name: Immersive Sleeping Encounters

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: Brings a lot of life to Joe Cobb, his friends and to a well-known showdown.
State.Name: Lively Joe and Friends

Original.Name: Uncut Strip NPC - Don't Touch My Street Vendor Patch-74798-USNPCStreetVendorPatch-1-1672507825.zip

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: A place to store incomplete, weird, creepy, bugged, cursed and super tiny mods from me.
State.Name: The Bazaar of Z

Original.Name: Strip Lights Region Fix - Vault 22 Flora Overhaul Remastered-73596-Patch-1644119165.7z

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Fixes a vanilla issue about the Strip lights not showing in certain parts of the map.
State.Name: Strip Lights Region Fix

State.Author: lStewieAl - Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Increases the render resolution of in-game screens (Pipboy, terminals, character creation menu) to match game's screen resolution.
State.Name: High Resolution Screens

State.Author: Ashens2014
State.Description: adds a rotation Animation to the Freeside Structure - Model replacement - no esp used
State.Name: Freeside

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: i also made-a da roads a black
State.Name: ROADS

State.Author: Hopper31
State.Description: Restores the visibility of the equations in the Forbidden Zone from OWB to be in line with the console version and ending slides.
State.Name: Forbidden Zone Equations Restored

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
Engine bugfixes, optional tweaks and new features with no performance impact. Fully customisable via in-game menu and INIs. 

Includes Inventory Searching, Cookable Grenades, Manual Reload, Smooth Aiming, WASD Menu Support and more. 

Fully compatible with TTW and The Frontier.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks and Engine Fixes

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A collection of small essential gameplay improvements for the official DLCs that have been fully merged, updated, and cleaned.
State.Name: Essential DLC Enhancements Merged

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: Qolore7 - MonoAccipiter - Paladin555
State.Description: You like remasters? But what about *re*-remasters? This mod aims to add new life the the Mojave Wasteland by making bland locations more detailed.
State.Name: New Vegas Landscape Overhaul Re-Remastered

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: Animation in first and third POV for ingestibles.
State.Name: Animated Ingestibles

State.Author: B42
State.Description: Dynamically adds ISControl node system animation support + easy per-weapon sights adjustment
State.Name: ISControl Enabler

State.Author: Glenrhee - Optimizations by me
State.Description: Optimized version of Freeside Facelift mod.
State.Name: Freeside Facelift LITE

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: Brings a lot of life to Joe Cobb, his friends and to a well-known showdown.
State.Name: Lively Joe and Friends

State.Author: -Kiwi-
State.Description: Fixes an annoying vanilla oversight.
State.Name: Lucky 38 Light Pollution Clip Fix

State.Author: hman101
State.Description: Adds a dialogue option to some food vendors that allows you to "order a meal" which removes the player's thirst and hunger similar to how doctors can remove radiation.
State.Name: Order a Meal

State.Author: tom2g0
State.Description: Adds palm trees with lights to the Strip.
State.Name: Strip Palm Trees

State.Author: Kormakur
State.Description: xNVSE plugin that enables having custom animations for weapons and actors. Fixes the engine-bound anim group limit problem.
State.Name: kNVSE Animation Plugin

Original.Name: Animated Chip Poles with Red Light orbs-73507-V1-1630377365.rar

State.Author: Ashens2014
State.Description: Lucky 38 casino pole chips go spin spin - makes the poles with "casino chips" on them spin!
State.Name: Lucky 38 casino chips go spin spin (Animation mod)

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Simple recolor of the Mojaves rocks.
State.Name: Hit - Rock Recolor

State.Author: Roni
State.Description: Atmospheric Lighting Tweaks makes changes to Image Spaces and Lighting Templates to give interiors a more dynamic and atmospheric look.
State.Name: Atmospheric Lighting Tweaks (FNV and TTW)

State.Author: The Dormies - Demorome and Trooper
State.Description:
An NVSE plugin which adds new functions and engine-level tweaks.

For heathens who have forsaken the Vanilla-Style way.
State.Name: ShowOff NVSE Plugin

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Removes ghouls "roar" animation that plays before they attack, meaning they now charge the player instantly - making them much deadlier
State.Name: Better Ghouls - No Roar Animation

State.Author: KaneWright
State.Description: This mod makes door window and small window under door semitransparent.
State.Name: Semitransparent Door Glass(plugin version)

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: A place to store incomplete, weird, creepy, bugged, cursed and super tiny mods from me.
State.Name: The Bazaar of Z

State.Author: Demorome
State.Description: Combat music will only start when certain conditions are met. These conditions have been tweaked from the original "Passive Combat Music" mod.
State.Name: Passive Combat Music Tweaked

State.Author: Mastahbossu
State.Description: Delays DLC until you meet certain requirements, no more quests and messages as soon as you step out of Doc Mitchell's house.
State.Name: Simple DLC Delay

State.Author: tom2g0
State.Description: Adds palm trees with lights to the Strip.
State.Name: Strip Palm Trees

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Plugin to add clipboard paste support, as well as ctrl left/right and backspace/delete to aid typing in console.
State.Name: Console Paste Support

Original.Name: Lively Joe and Friends - Config File-80285-Config-1-1678057911.zip

State.Author: zebumper
State.Description: Brings a lot of life to Joe Cobb, his friends and to a well-known showdown.
State.Name: Lively Joe and Friends

State.Author: The Dormies - Demorome and Trooper
State.Description:
An NVSE plugin which adds new functions and engine-level tweaks.

For heathens who have forsaken the Vanilla-Style way.
State.Name: ShowOff NVSE Plugin

State.Author: Ashens2014
State.Description: Animated Vault 21 Hotel Sign
State.Name: Animated Vault 21 Hotel Sign

State.Author: asdfsou
State.Description: Adds a shortcut in Freeside between the King's School of Impersonation and Mick and Ralph's place.
State.Name: Freeside West East Shortcut

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This plugin fixes the Fallout New Vegas mod limit bug. It allows a maximum of 255 plugins to be loaded. It can also cause an increase in fps, remove game stutter and allow for faster loading times especially when using a large number of mods.
State.Name: FNV Mod Limit Fix
